evidence.claim: Genesis Technologies utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure.
The company supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Genesis Technologies incorporates HIPAA compliance in its health tech solutions.
EHR integrations are part of the company's health digitalization efforts.
Utilizes Microsoft Azure for data management and analytics solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on healthcare data exchange and robust API integrations indicates potential ICP needs.
